couldnt try it as it wouldnt load
Wekan is a brilliant Kanban tool and has helped me in boosting my productivity!
summary: Great app for productivity! I love Kanbans!

description: It installs fine but when i tried to run it, it does not work only a terminal loads up bunch of things then nothing.....

set url address: sudo snap set wekan root-url='http://localhost:5000'
set port: sudo snap set wekan port='5000'
restart app: sudo systemctl restart snap.wekan.wekan
summary: it's very useful but need configuration

description: Great UI, very efficient, has good functionality that rival competitors like trello but is free. The only down fall is that you should modify root-url and port setting for it to work, doesn't work out of the box.
summary: Excellent app, very useful for a team as well as individual use

description: No helpful documentation to get started. Not worth the time to figure it out. I don't have an hour to give to figuring this out.
Maintainer should give quick help to get started with this. Now command line prints lot of variables and options to set in. Too hard to get started.
A erminul shows and gone
i don't know i installed it but i can't find it ???
I was unable to find this after install. Moving to another app
summary: Did not show up after install

description:
After applying the following changes, open it on localhost:5000 on your browser

set url address: sudo snap set wekan root-url='http://localhost:5000'
set port: sudo snap set wekan port='5000'
restart app: sudo systemctl restart snap.wekan.wekan

YOU MUST FIRST RUN COMMANDS To get it to work!

Instructions here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IVJNUteaWgA

Or get Stacks.rocks Kanban board as it's much better for personal use.
summary: Good App to Stay Organized but stacks.rocks is better lol

description:
after installing you are probably not finished... reading a comments about set - set - restart.. This is not clear to me and if this needs to be done, this info should be noticed in the app-info not through a comment.

Back to the browser :-)

Hi,
it requires settings. At Terminal, type:

sudo snap set wekan root-url='http://localhost'
sudo snap set wekan port='80'

Then use it with webbrowser at http://localhost

For more info, see:
https://github.com/wekan/wekan-snap/wiki/Install

https://github.com/wekan/wekan/wiki/Settings

https://github.com/wekan/wekan/wiki/Adding-users

Many questions have been already answered at:

https://github.com/wekan/wekan/issues

https://github.com/wekan/wekan/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aclosed

https://github.com/wekan/wekan/wiki

Best Regards,
Wekan Support
Lauri Ojansivu (xet7)
CEO of Wekan Team

simple
handy
recommend
terrible setup/UI
Leider startet das Programm bei klicken auf START überhaupt nicht. Es ist auch nicht im Startmenü zu finden. Schade!

Nach der Installation und Klick auf "Start" -> Browser auf http://localhost:8080 öffnen (zumindest bei mir). Ansonsten in /snap/wekan/current/bin/config nachsehen. 2 Zeilen Erläuterung in der Beschreibung von wekan, hätten viel Ärger erspart.
summary: Funktioniert, leider keine Startanweisung zu finden

description:
Habe bis jetzt noch nichts gefunden, was mir fehlt.

Bzgl. der Funktion bitte beachten:

Es werden nach der Installation keine Icons angelegt. Gestartet wird die Weboberfläche über die URL:

http://localhost:8080/

Hier muss abschließend nur noch über den Punkt:

Noch kein Konto? Registrieren

Ein Konto angelegt werden. Danach ist die Software einsatzbereit.

Tiefgreifendere Einstellungen und deren Befehle können über:

1. Terminal öffnen
2. wekan.help eingeben und mit Enter Taste bestätigen

eingesehen werden.

Das Programm ist weder in der Programmübersicht noch in Bash via Befehl zu finden. 
Somit ist es leider nicht nutzbar. 

Schade!
impossible à lancer
Aucune application dans le menu, impossible a lancer
Application installée mais introuvable et impossible à lancer. INUTILE.
Installed, run the console but never opened program
For those who have trouble opening wekan, here's the solution: open your browser and enter 'http://localhost:8080' in the search box, then hit enter.
